video.title: Building a Modern React Application from Scratch - Complete Tutorial
video.description:
In this comprehensive tutorial, we'll build a complete React application from scratch. Learn modern React patterns, hooks, state management, and best practices. We'll cover everything from setup to deployment. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers looking to level up their React skills.

üî• What you'll learn:
‚Ä¢ React Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext, useReducer)
‚Ä¢ Component Architecture
‚Ä¢ State Management Patterns
‚Ä¢ Responsive Design
‚Ä¢ Performance Optimization
‚Ä¢ Deployment Strategies

üìö Chapters:
0:00 Introduction
2:30 Project Setup
15:45 Component Structure
30:20 State Management
45:10 API Integration
60:00 Styling & Responsiveness
75:30 Deployment

üìÅ GitHub Repository: https://github.com/example/react-tutorial

#React #WebDevelopment #JavaScript #Programming #Frontend

comments.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! The explanation of useEffect dependencies was super clear. Can you make a video on React Server Components next?
Great tutorial! The project structure section was especially helpful. One suggestion: maybe add a section about testing with Jest and React Testing Library.
The performance optimization tips saved our application! We reduced initial load time by 40%. Thanks for the practical examples.
As a beginner, some parts were a bit fast for me. Could you make a slower-paced version for absolute beginners?
Production-ready patterns explained well. The custom hooks section was gold! Would love to see more real-world examples.
